    AddUser, EditUser

    public abstract class UserGUIAbstract
extends GUIAbstract
    extended by AddUser, EditUser, ViewUser classes
    Create common components, initialize them, and define a layout and user interface.
    Author:
    maint

      • readyToSendRequest

        protected boolean readyToSendRequest()
        Check pre-condition to send request to server.
        Used in AddUser, EditUser when click button "Add" or "Save".
        Specified by:
        readyToSendRequest in class GUIAbstract
        Returns:
        true if:
      • full name field is valid.
      • user name field is valid.
      • and email field is valid.
        else false.
